plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a yummy snack!
🌱 I grow under the dirt.
🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me.

plant.question: I am tall and have many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very big and strong.
🍃 I have lots of green leaves.
🐦 Squirrels also love to climb me!

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I am pretty and grow in gardens.
🐝 Bees collect nectar from me.
🌸 I come in many different colors.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. I am a yummy vegetable often used in salads. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy and cool.
🪴 I grow on a long, winding plant.
🥗 You can slice me up and put me in a salad.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels love to bury me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I am small and round.
🐿️ Squirrels like to hide me for the winter.
🍂 I fall from trees in the autumn.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a type of corn.
🔥 I need heat to become fluffy.
🎬 People love to eat me while watching movies.

plant.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and a sweet green inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am small and oval-shaped.
🟢 My skin is brown and fuzzy, and my flesh is green.
🥄 You can scoop out my inside with a spoon.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in water. Ducks like to swim near me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I often float on the surface of lakes and ponds.
🐸 Frogs also like to sit on me.
💧 I need lots of water to live.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stalk and golden seeds. You can make oil from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I follow the sun throughout the day.
☀️ My face is big and yellow.
🧑‍🍳 My seeds can be used to make healthy oil.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a small tree. You can roast me and eat me with dip. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green and have many little florets.
🌳 I look like a tiny tree.
🧀 I taste yummy with cheese or ranch dip.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not a bird. I make puddles! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌧️ I come from clouds.

weather.question: I am big and bright and hot. I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.
🔥 I keep the Earth warm.

weather.question: I am white and cold and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice.
⛄ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I am falling.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
💧 I can bring rain.

weather.question: I make the leaves swirl and the trees dance. You can't see me but you can feel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I move things around.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I can be gentle or strong.

weather.question: I'm a colorful arc that appears after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
✨ People say there's a pot of gold at my end.
☀️ I appear when the sun and rain are together.

weather.question: I am a storm with loud noises and bright flashes. What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ I have thunder and lightning.
🌩️ I can be scary.
🔦 I have flashes of light.

weather.question: I am a big ball of ice that falls from the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am cold and hard.
⚾ I can be small or big like a ball.
💥 I can break things when I fall.

weather.question: I am water vapor that is very close to the ground. It can be hard to see through me. What am I?

hints.text: 👻 It makes things look blurry
🚗 You need to be careful when driving through me
🌫️ It's like a cloud on the ground

weather.question: I am tiny, frozen rain. It's colder than rain, but not as snowy as snow. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am icy.
☔️ I am often mixed with rain.
🧊 I am smaller than hailstones.
